name: Start a Business
description: Embark on your entrepreneurial journey with RK Realtors & Consultants! With an expert by our side, you can confidently manage your startup. Our “Start a Business” service guides you through everything, from idea conception to incorporation.  Our expert advisors ensure strategic planning while maintaining legal compliance thereby ensuring the long-term success of your venture

name: Business Formation
description: At RK Realtors & Consultants, our experts simplify the entire process for you when it comes to business formation. We provide tailored solutions whether you are setting up a sole proprietorship, corporation, or partnership

name: Special Entity Registration
description: Our team helps you seamlessly navigate the specialized entity registration procedure effortlessly with RK Realtor & Consultants. Our team of experts facilitates registration for societies, trusts, NGOs, and other entities taking care of all regulatory and legal frameworks and requirements
subServices: NGO REGISTRATION AS A SECTION 8 COMPANY

name: Intellectual Property Rights (IPR)
description: Protect your creative work, brand, and innovations with our IPR services. Our experienced legal team assists you with patent registrations, copyright, and trademark safeguarding your assets from unauthorized use and infringement

name: ISO Certifications
description: Want to demonstrate your brand commitment to quality and excellence? Our consultants help you streamline the process for competitiveness and enhanced credibility.  Whether you are pursuing ISO 14001 or ISO 9001, our team has you covered
subServices: ISO 29990 : 2010 - NON FORMAL EDUCATION AND TRAINING
ISO 13485 : 2016 - QUALITY MANAGEMENT FOR MEDICAL DEVICES

name: Accounting, Auditing & Taxation
description: Want to ensure compliance and financial transparency? Want to get rid of tax hassles? Our qualified accountants at RK Realtors & Consultants offer you comprehensive solutions tailored to your business requirements. Whether you seek tax planning, auditing, or bookkeeping services, our team has you covered

name: Popular Registrations
description: Get access to swift and accurate essential registrations with RK Realtors & Consultants. With TAN and PAN, shop licenses to GST registrations, our team helps you expedite the process

name: Other Certifications
description: Want to meet industry standards? Our team at RK Realtors & Consultants helps you acquire a diverse range of compliance certifications so you stay ahead in the competitive marketplace.
subServices: HALAL CERTIFICATION ( FOR MIDDLE EAST COMPANY)

name: Entity Conversions
description: Optimize your business structures and streamline transitions with RK Realtors & and Consultants. Whether you want to convert from a sole proprietorship to a corporation or are keen on restructuring partnerships, our legal experts will ensure smooth transitions.
subServices: PRIVATE LIMITED TO PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY
PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY TO PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Secretarial Compliances
description: Always stay on top of regulatory obligations by teaming up with RK Realtors & and Consultants. Our team ensures timely filings, adherence to governance standards, countering legal issues, risk of penalties, and more.
subServices: Annual Compliance For Private Limited Company

name: Business Collaborations
description: Want to explore new business opportunities or forge strategic partnerships? Our team facilitates joint ventures, collaborations, mutual growth, and alliances in dynamic markets.
